details: Experience gained by fighting the Mist Army is increased by 75%.
The quantity of Oak Wood harvested by lumberjacks is increased by 150%.
A special repeatable quest is available today near the fountain in Amakna Village. It is available to players of level 20 or higher and is not attached to the offering quest.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Milicluster area are increased by 100%.
Fishermen save 10% of their ingredients when they craft items.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 200% in the Tynril Lab dungeon.
Experience gained in the Dark Forest is increased by 100%.
The quantity of meat harvested by hunters of all levels is increased by 100%.
An extra challenge is generated for fights against Firefoux.
All varieties of Golden Dragoturkey will give birth to one extra baby.
The chances of obtaining loot from Tears of Ouronigride monsters are increased by 75%.
All experience given as a reward for quests is increased by 100%.
The reward bonus on groups of monsters increases every 3 hours in the Akwadala area.
Experience gained by mounts is increased by 200%.
The quantity of Sage harvested by alchemists is increased by 125%.
The chances of obtaining loot in the the Koolich Cavern dungeon are increased by 125%.
Harvesters save 15% of their ingredients when they craft items in the Lonesome Pine Trails area.
Experience gained by fighting Zoths is increased by 75%.
Fish of all types will reappear 100% more quickly than usual.
The chances of obtaining loot on the Dreggon Peninsula are increased by 100%.
The quantity of items crafted by Hunters is increased by 25%
Experience gained in the Tainela area is increased by 100%.
The reward bonus on groups of monsters increases every 3 hours in the Desolation of Sidimote area.
The quantity of Iron harvested by miners is increased by 150%.
The chances of obtaining loot from Lonesome Pine Trail monsters are increased by 75%.
Experience gained in the Wa Wabbit's Castle is increased by 125%.
Carvers save 10% of their ingredients when they craft items.
The quantity of Hemp harvested by farmers is increased by 125%.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 150% against Snowfoux.
An extra challenge is generated for fights against monsters in the Snowy Forest area.
Trikortritt Surprises have been added to monster loot. When you use one, you'll either receive an Al Howin's Treat or be turned into a Little Borbkin.
